articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Newly-discovered tropical tree is named after Leonardo DiCaprio - Daily Mail
articles.description: Scientists at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, said they wanted to honour the Hollywood actor for his help in petitioning against logging in the Ebo Forest in Cameroon last year.
articles.content:
A tropical tree that is new to science has been named after Leonardo DiCaprio in recognition of his campaigning to save the rainforest where it was found.

articles.title: Hoda Kotb, host of NBC's 'Today,' tests positive for Covid-19 - CNN
articles.description: After hosts of NBC's late night shows were hit with Covid, the network's morning show had a host of its own catch the virus.
